title: paripurNa kaama baavamuna
sahitya:
paripUrNa kAma bhAvamuna maraci nAma

anupallavi

 parama kAruNikOttama bhava jIvanaja bhavArcita

caraNam

 sAkEtadhIpa nI mukha sarasIruhamu jUpi sAkE madi lEDEti savaranA rAma
I kali nanusarincina hIna jAti martyula cIkAku bADaga taramE shrIkara tyAgarAjanuta
